description: Calls a voting to switch <nick> to spectators
(VIP) Opens a menu with wearable hats
Calls a voting to set certain tank and witch spawn points (in percentages)
Shows point bonus rules for actual map
Shows current tank and witch spawn points (in percentages)
Shows your current statistics (damage done to SI, CI, teammates)
Marks a spot on the map, visible to your teammates
Calls a voting to mix teams
